comment.author: 11418107@N02
comment._content: I'm guessing that's May Esther Peterson Thompson (1880-1952), American opera singer. www.tshaonline.org/handbook/online/articles/TT/fth48.html www.cemetery.state.tx.us/pub/user_form.asp?pers_id=2314

comment.author: 35234565@N04
comment._content: I think that you're right, pennylrichardsca.  Thanks for your great links.  One of them includes a photograph in which she's wearing the same incredible costume as Delibes in the opera "Lakme." We'll add a note with this information next time we update the record.  Good work!
